name: OCKReadOnlyEventStore
desc: A read-only store that fetches event data objects.

items.name: func fetchEvent(forTask: Self.Task, occurrence: Int, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Event>)
items.desc: Fetches a single occurrence of a specific task asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func fetchEvents(taskID: String, query: OCKEventQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Event]>)
items.desc: Fetches all occurrences of a specific task asynchronously from the store.
